abstract: Out Here column in Decatur, Ga; Oak Grove United Methodist Church’s annual community barbecue, which is celebrating its 50th year, is cause for pilgrimage to Decatur, when three tons of pork are served up to more than 5,000 diners in what has become its own religious experience.
snippet: Oak Grove United Methodist Church’s annual community barbecue, which celebrated its 50th year on Saturday, is a cause for pilgrimage in Atlanta’s suburbs.
lead_paragraph: Oak Grove United Methodist Church’s annual community barbecue, which celebrated its 50th year on Saturday, is a cause for pilgrimage in Atlanta’s suburbs.

headline.main: A Blessed Barbecue Feast and a Half-Century of Pilgrimages
headline.print_headline: A Blessed Barbecue Feast And a Half-Century of Pilgrimages
headline.seo: A Blessed Barbecue Feast in Decatur, Ga.
